name: Suprapong
description: Face your friends in a circular arena containing up to 6 players. Smash the ball and use your powers to surprise your opponents. Change the rules of the game at will to create games to your measure ! Are you ready to become the master of the arena ?
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7 Processor: core I3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nvidia geforce gts 450 Storage: 60 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 7 Processor: core I5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nvidia geforce gtx 460 Storage: 60 MB available space
